body.p:
Hartford July 28th 1863
To the Govr
Dr Sir

I send you an affadavit of one of our best citizens who was robbed of a horse by a noted thief -- the Thief is now confied in Jail at Rockport Ind on a charge for stabing & it is questionable whether they will be able to convict him & the citizens of Ind are very solicitous that he shall not escape & the object is to get you to demand him from the Govr of Ind & get him the authority to take him in the event he is not convicted on his trial at Rockport -- the Court there commences some tiime in August --
I would suggest that you appoint Mr Rowe the approved to as agent to bring him to Ky --

Requisition for Tho. Reid
Fugitive
"Felony"
Issd Aug 5. 1863
Edmd Rowe Agent
